Plot: A teenage girl divides her time between working in London for the famed Belgian sleuth, Hercule Poirot, and staying in the countryside with her shrewd great-aunt, Jane Marple.
Title: Agasa Kurisutî no meitantei Powaro to Mâpuru
Actors: Fumiko Orikasa, Masako Jô, Kôtarô Satomi, Hirofumi Nojima
